name: Automatic Cat Water Fountain
imageAlt: Automatic cat water fountain with flowing water stream and filtration system
shortDescription: Keep your cat hydrated with a quiet, filtered water fountain that runs all day.
description: Cats are naturally drawn to running water, and this ultra-quiet fountain encourages them to drink more throughout the day. The triple-filtration system removes hair, debris, and impurities, ensuring every sip is fresh and clean. Perfect for Singapore's warm climate where hydration is essential for your feline friend's health.
features: Ultra-quiet pump operates below 30dB for undisturbed rest
Triple-filtration system with replaceable activated carbon filter
2-litre capacity keeps water flowing for days
BPA-free materials safe for daily use
LED indicator alerts you when water level is low
